title: Over 20 years ago, I would travel North Kerr Ave to go to work. I would see an area on east side of road that had a white cross with \'Colored Cemetary\' inscribed on it. I cannot find that area anymore, and would like to know the history behind the cemetary, thank you.
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question.



 http://www.myreporter.com/?p=9896



 



Ben Steelman
